content.html: If Boris Johnson survives the resignation of two senior cabinet ministers after being exposed as indifferent to abusive behaviour, criminal in his breach of covid rules and a brazen liar about all things Brexit, he is surely the cockroach of politics. Apologies to cockroaches
content.value:
If Boris Johnson survives the resignation of two senior cabinet ministers after being exposed as indifferent to abusive behaviour,  criminal in his breach of covid rules and a brazen liar about all things Brexit, he is surely the cockroach of politics.

Apologies to cockroaches
